purpose: Provide a comprehensive and curated list of Model Context Protocol (MCP) servers for developers and researchers.
principle: Aggregates information about various MCP servers, focusing on their features, capabilities, and use cases.
reusability: Serves as a reference guide for selecting MCP servers, useful for developers and researchers working with model context protocols.
limitations: Dependent on community contributions for updates; may not cover all available MCP servers comprehensively.
name: awesome-mcp-servers
description: A curated list of Model Context Protocol (MCP) servers
